name: THE MAZE RUNNER (itch) (absolute orange)
description:
You are in the middle of a foggy maze trying to escape without any instruction.

Drop a light prop to leave a trace on the road. Every 15 mins, you will be sent back to the middle of the maze, so run as fast as you can. Remember you are not alone in the maze, something is starving, it smells you. 

Your destiny is in your hand, your wit, and your luck.

GAMEPLAY: The Maze Runner is a first-person horror game in which you play the main character who is powerless, trying to escape the maze. Run, jump, and use limited resources to save yourself.

CONTROL:

WASD : Move

Left-Shift: Sprint

Space: Jump

C: Crouch

P: Pause

E: Drop light prop

NOTE: 

- Gamepad control is supported.
